title: Bacon, Prawn and Sweetcorn Chowder
ingredients: ['1 (375g) tin cream style corn', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of chicken soup', '350ml single cream', '4 tablespoons crumbled cooked bacon', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '225g cream cheese, cubed', '75g small cooked prawns']
